Nah, [JSONFile.load doesn't resolve anything](https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/modules/JSONFile.jsm#183,211,216) and we want to return the storage object.

On another PR I think I might've refactored this to

```js
storePromise = storage.load().then(() => storage);
```

But I figured for this PR that keeping the translation to async dumb was the way to go.
